mapper.select: SELECT wpp.id as id, wpp.`post_author` AS author, wpp.`post_content` AS content,wpp.`post_title` AS title,wpp.`post_date` AS postDate FROM wp_posts wpp WHERE wpp.`ID` IN (SELECT wptr.`object_id` FROM wp_terms wpt,wp_term_relationships wptr,wp_term_taxonomy wptt WHERE wpt.`term_id` = wptt.`term_id` AND wptt.`term_taxonomy_id` = wptr.`term_taxonomy_id` AND wpt.`term_id` = 67) ORDER BY id DESC
